channel.title: Help Making new teleport to new training area
channel.description:
Hello, can someone explain me how to make a teleport to a certain place and let it appear on the emotes table, like home, train, pk teleports.
thanks.

item.title: Help Making new teleport to new training area
item.dc:creator: @c00l_pker c00l pker
item.description:
@c00l_pker wrote:

text.handler, make one say train.

or w\e u want it to say…

go to client class. find the case that u made it say train.

make teleports to it, or make a command and put it in the case and tada…

kinda confusing the way i said but its easy after you have done it once…

eg:

should say something like:

p.sendFrame126("", 180); p.sendFrame126("@Whi@train", 181); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Veng", 162); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Shops", 169); p.sendFrame126("barrows", 177); p.sendFrame126("", 185); p.sendFrame126("", 186); p.sendFrame126("", 173); p.sendFrame126("", 179); p.sendFrame126("", 187); p.sendFrame126("", 176); p.sendFrame126("", 13371); p.sendFrame126("", 13372); p.sendFrame126("", 13373); p.sendFrame126("", 13374); p.sendFrame126("", 13376); p.sendFrame126("", 13378); p.sendFrame126("", 13380); p.sendFrame126("", 13381); p.sendFrame126("", 13382); p.sendFrame126("", 11102); p.sendFrame126("", 13379); p.sendFrame126("", 13377); p.sendFrame126("", 13375); p.sendFrame126("", 11103); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Walk", 160); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Run", 159); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Energy Left:", 148); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Move Speed", 158); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Auto Retaliate", 155); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Closewindow", 3902); p.sendFrame126("@whi@On", 157); p.sendFrame126("@whi@Off", 156)

add ‘train’ to the list so it will say that on one of the tabs.

  1. move ur mouse over the tab, go into client class search case (numba):

make a command, eg:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train")) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("you have teleported to train!"); }

find case eg:

case 168: if (teleblock == true) { // Made by mod luke sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("home"); // made by mod luke } break;

change home to train, will mean it will do that command and tele you to the place.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Making new teleport to new training area
